text: "Living After Midnight" is a 1980 song by British heavy metal band Judas Priest. It is the leading single from their sixth studio album British Steel and went to number 12 in the United Kingdom. It was covered by The Donnas for their fourth studio album The Donnas Turn 21 in 2002 and Disturbed in 2010. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Judas Priest songs Category:The Donnas songs Category:Disturbed (band) songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Living After Midnight
